sqlMap.select: SELECT SUM(p.pay_money) AS amount FROM oms.ord_order_t t, oms.ord_order_pay_t p WHERE t.order_dt >= date_format(#gmtStart#, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AND t.order_dt <= date_format(#gmtEnd#, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AND t.order_id = p.order_id AND t.order_status = '0005' AND t.org_id = #shopId#

SELECT p.pay_money AS amount, t.order_cd AS tradeNo, DATE_FORMAT(t.order_dt, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS tradeDate FROM oms.ord_order_t t, oms.ord_order_pay_t p WHERE t.order_dt >= date_format(#gmtStart#, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AND t.order_dt <= date_format(#gmtEnd#, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AND t.order_id = p.order_id AND t.order_status = '0005' AND t.org_id = #shopId# ORDER BY t.order_dt DESC
